Comments.Message: Those settings are left over from Rawr2, we aren't actually using them in any way in Rawr4. That's why they are resetting back to blank after you try to set them manually.

You say that it isn't getting your proxy configs. Are you saying this because you are attempting to load from the battle.net armory and it's failing? Do you have the error from loading like that you can send us?

According to my research, Silverlight is designed to communicate through the browser's connection settings. So if you are using the web version of Rawr, it's going to follow whatever your browser is set up to do. If you install the web version offline, it will either use the browser's proxy or the OS's proxy (most likely the browser's).

If you are talking about the WPF version, we haven't built any options in for proxies yet.
Is there any chance for proxy settings for the down loadable version?
